Parameters: int: One of @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_PROVIDER_NOT_FOUND_E@, @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_FONT_NOT_FOUND_E@, @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_FONT_LOAD_ERROR_E@, @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_FONT_UNAVAILABLE_E@ or @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_MALFORMED_QUERY_E@ if returned by the system. May also be a positive value greater than 0 defined by the font provider as an additional error code. Refer to the provider's documentation for more information on possible returned error codes. Value is @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_PROVIDER_NOT_FOUND_E@, @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_FONT_LOAD_ERROR_E@, @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_FONT_NOT_FOUND_E@, @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_FONT_UNAVAILABLE_E@, or @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#FAIL_REASON_MALFORMED_QUERY_E@
onTypefaceRequestFailed(int).Description: Called when a Typeface request done via @B_android#provider#FontsContract#requestFonts_E@} fails.

onTypefaceRetrieved(android.graphics.Typ.Description: Called then a Typeface request done via @B_android#provider#FontsContract#requestFonts_E@ is complete. Note that this method will not be called if @B_android#provider#FontsContract#FontRequestCallback#onTypefaceRequestFailed_E@ is called instead.

ClassDesc: Interface used to receive asynchronously fetched typefaces.
